title: One Hot Encoding in Machine Learning
description: In machine learning, one hot encoding is a method of quantifying categorical data. Briefly, this method produces a vector of length equal to the number of categories in the dataset. In this article, I will introduce you to the One Hot Encoding Algorithm in Machine Learning.To learn what One Hot Encoding is we first need to go through what Encoding is to understand what One Hot Encoding is. And yes it is one of the most important concepts in Machine Learning. So let’s get started with this task.Also, Read – Machine Learning Books You Need to Read.
